name: Food Delivery

name: Grocery delivery
discription: Hey,Hope you are keeping well.Swift Delivery service is came up to help you with grocery delivery service.You can enjoy this service just for 150 taka.We provide 30% discount on friday on grocery delivery.Stay with us and enjoy your shopping

name: Safe Water delivery
discription: Water is called fluid of life.Water Must be safe.Arsenic water causes cancer.so with a vision to provide you safe water we came up with safe water delivery service.Book order for safe water.Happy delivery.

name: Express Delivery
discription: Express delivery is our special Service you can enjoy more thern one service at a time with speical discount.we provide 1O% discount on express delivery.and express delivery reach you product quciker then normal delivery.
